pr_title: Cleanup fml package and fix HoverChecker

timeline.message: Cleanup client package to remove unused stuff

timeline.bodyText: Can the other import for button be removed now? Glancing at the class it seems like it could be but didn't open up a workspace to verify
timeline.author: pupnewfster

timeline.message: Also remove legacy classes from fml.common and fml root package
Refactor: Rename and repackage fml gui classes

timeline.bodyText: Couldn’t this be an import instead of a fully qualified reference?
timeline.author: Cadiboo

timeline.bodyText: Couldn’t this be an import instead of a qualified reference?
timeline.author: Cadiboo

replies.bodyText: Because I renamed the ModListWidget to just ModList, which is now I duplicate name. I will revert it to ModListWidget to avoid confusion
replies.author: ichttt

replies.bodyText: And this is a indication that you shouldn't of named it that.
replies.author: LexManos

timeline.message:
Fix ModListWidget name to avoid confusion and collision.
Also delete CheckBox, as vanilla has it's own CheckBox now which looks much better
